content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generation system at x=-25.0 y=80.5
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at x=-20.5 y=69.5 (now connected with 15 pipes)
- Boiler at x=-25.0 y=80.5 (working with coal fuel)
- Steam engine at x=-25.5 y=89.5 (now connected with 12 pipes, producing 15000 power)
- Pipe networks:
  - Water system connecting pump to boiler (now functional)
  - Steam system connecting boiler to engine (now functional)

### Copper mining operation at x=-55.5 y=70.5
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at x=-55.5 y=70.5 (output blocked, no power)
- Missing burner inserter at x=-55.5 y=72.5 (previously existed but now missing)
- Stone furnace at x=-55.0 y=75.0 (no ingredients)
- Wooden chest at x=-55.5 y=76.5 (empty output storage)
- Small electric pole placement attempts failed (blocked by existing objects)

### Iron mining operation at x=15.5 y=70.5
(No changes from previous report)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at x=15.5 y=70.5 (currently no power)
- Stone furnace at x=16.0 y=74.0 (no ingredients)
- Burner inserter at x=15.5 y=72.5 (working)
- Wooden chest at x=15.5 y=75.5 (empty output storage)

## ERROR TIPS

### Power network issues
- Complete power network connections (steam engine now connected but still shows "not connected to power network")
- Resolve small electric pole placement issues (multiple failed attempts at x=-55.5,70.5 and x=-25.5,89.5)
- Verify power pole placement positions (existing objects blocking placement)

### Entity management
- Implement entity existence verification (burner inserter missing at x=-55.5 y=72.5)
- Track entity state changes (missing inserter not detected)
- Clear output blockages (copper drill still blocked at x=-55.5 y=70.5)

### Placement distance errors
- Move closer before placing entities (repeated small electric pole placement failures)
- Implement distance checks before placement attempts
- Verify clear space before placement (multiple "existing object in the way" errors)

### Production chain monitoring
- Supply ingredients to furnace (stone furnace at x=-55.0 y=75.0 still has no ingredients)
- Verify inserter functionality (missing inserter affecting production chain)
- Monitor fuel levels in boilers and furnaces

### System verification
- Implement connection status verification (steam engine shows connected but status says NOT_CONNECTED)
- Verify fluid systems (boiler shows "no input liquid" despite connections)
- Monitor power production and consumption metrics
